title: Lincoln's WARNING #100034: Tech Layoffs Continue
script: Tech Layoffs Continue? Let me explain the CON: They got you arguing about CRUMBS while they eating the whole CAKE! Left vs Right? That's the SHOW! Real fight is UP vs DOWN, but they keep you fighting LEFT vs RIGHT! WAKE UP! Bitcoin below. Tech Layoffs Continue? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
